name: Veronica J Woodard
text: Blaze Pizza is blazin hot!  Located at the George Bush International Airport, Terminal A  is the place to be when you are desiring to eat a delicious, reasonably priced meal.  #So good you gotta try.

name: Kenly Urquiza Garcia
text: Never seize to amaze me how simple and how great a pizza can be. Add this, little bit more of that, nothing of the other and voila in 5 mins you have the pizza that you love.

name: Kristopher Lauro
text: There is a reason that there is "ALWAYS" a line at this place! Good selection.  Choose you sauce - normal or spicy (or combine the two). Then choose your toppings. Baked in front of you.  Pizza is a solid 7 out of 10 (and I'm a harsh pizza …More

name: Andrew Sorlie
text: Fantastic lunch at Blaze Pizza. After wandering two terminals (with four hours to kill) and realizing that pretty much everyone can find something to complain about on Google Reviews at any airport eatery, I opted for Blaze and was very …More

name: David pincince
text: Absolutely outstanding in every way.  Fresh ingredients.  Great people.  Streamlined and efficient service.  Fair prices and a great value.  Definitely will be back.

name: Tim Deardeuff
text: Surprisingly good pizza for being in an airport terminal. Reasonably fast, also a necessity for an airport terminal. The pizza is made fresh when you order. There toppings were good the sauce was outstanding. I recommend grabbing one on your way to the gate.

name: char sidney
text: Best Vegan option in the airport!!!!  I got vegan cheese/ spicy tomato sauce with all the veggies available and then topped with arugula and olive oil/salt. It's a delicious gourmet thin crust pizza!!

name: Terence Dupree
text: Pleasantly surprised at such a great value inside of an airport. Staff was great and my creation of a pizza was delicious!!!!! My fiance couldn't believe she could create her on pizza! Perfect for the person who loves to customize (butcher) the menu to their liking!

name: Elizabeth Hathlisberg
text: This is my favorite place to come in the entire airport. Their pizza is so much better than any other big chain pizza stores like Pizza Hut or dominos. If you’re flying out of IAH and you have some free time, give it a try!

name: Aaron Gonzales
text: Man how much I wish I had a blaze pizza where I live. The pizza is just fantastic. Unforgettable.

name: Michael Wong
text: Amazing! Build your own pizza for only $8.40! Unlimited toppings and vegan cheese option!! I loaded my pizza with veggies and pineapple. The pizza was tasty and only took 10 minutes to bake fresh. I wish we had Blaze Pizzas in Oregon. I had friendly service as well.

name: Christine Malseed
text: Delicious, fast pizza with any toppings for less than $10. One pizza could feed two people. It was soooo good.

name: Jonathon Musgrove
text: Horrible experience in the Bush airport with one staff member. Asked for light sauce and was given a tablespoon on the pizza. She didnt look like she liked her job cause the service was poor and trying to degrade a customs cause I want …More

name: Megan Thayer
text: Decent pizza. Was pretty quick. Waited maybe 5 minutes. A lot of topping options. Reasonably priced (was about $9). …More

name: Yug S
text: Fast. Clean. Delicious. Plenty of toppings. Keto crust. Some olive oil and arugula in the end elevates the pizza to another level. Not at all pricey for an airport outlet. Wish they had fresh mozzarella rather than shredded.

name: Joe Franco
text: As I arrive to order my pizza today, I notice the lady with long braided extensions loading the napkin dispenser while she is scratching her head vigorously. Same person that has served me several times and always I notice not only does she …More

name: Rafael Morales
text: Very good service and delicious pizza specially if you are waiting for the plane. Surprisingly fast which is great.

name: Nicholas M
text: Just stopping by looking for vegan options in airport. Saw this make your own pizza joint. Reasonably priced no doubt. Ordered a BBQ sauce pizza, was shocked to find they had vegan cheese, and was able to create the best pizza I have ever …More

name: Minesh Mehta
text: Good option for pizza lovers at airport terminal.

name: David Cayley
text:
How can you go wrong
Great thin crust pizza with any topping you want and cooked fast and 9 dollars
DEAL

name: Scott Keiser
text: A little slow so make sure you have at least 10 to 15 minutes to wait.  Otherwise it's pretty good.  Fresh while you wait.  Prices are a little high

name: Linnea Pecsenye
text: It isn’t anywhere on the signage but when you get up to the front where all the ingredients are... behold. BLAZE PIZZA HAS VEGAN CHEESE AND VEGAN CHORIZO! Total life saver in an airport with very minimal vegan options.

name: Michael Watkins
text: Worst blaze I have ever been to. Extremely slow, disjointed service. They couldn't keep the pizzas in order. Ingredients all in one clump in the middle. Burnt the pizza. …More

name: Justin Kelloway
text: Quick, cheap and fresh ingredients. Can't really ask for much more in a pre flight meal. Only thing keeping it for 5 stars is that I thought the pick up system was a little confusing.

name: Beautiful Nessa
text: One of the Beeeeeeeeeest Pizza I have EVER tasted!!! Wood oven made in front of you and you even get to make your own if you want for 8.99$US + tax. From the sauce, to the cheese, to meat, to anything else you want. I've had it twice soo far and ABSOLUTELY recommend it. You won't regret it TRUST ME!

name: Caroline S
text: Food: I had a custom built pizza with a regular crust - pepperoni, mushrooms, spinach, cherry tomatoes, red onion. It was excellent. It is not NYC gourmet, but it is also not your basic pizza joint and basic pizza. This is better and is …More

name: Jeremy Powers
text: Great pizza but they don't accept rewards.

name: Rocket Man
text: Oven made and hot all the way to the last bite! Several crust and topping options. Super fast service. Informative staff. Cheap and fulfilling. Build your own option for only 8.95 (airport pricing). Several drink options. Fries available.  Seating area.

name: Matt Dufton
text: Good pizza. To much for one. Good size potions.

name: Jack Haynes
text: If I could give a zero I would. Just walked away with a barely cooked cold pizza where the sauce was room temperature, the cheese unmelted and the veggies raw. The crust bent like dough. Wth. Worse pizza ever. Would have returned but catching a plane.

name: Kayla Garber
text: First stop after we landed in Houston. Extensive menu. Lunch buffet is great! Pizza is super delicious and salad bar is nice and fresh.

name: Viola Aragon
text: The pizza is nothing short of amazing!

name: Katie Jacobs
text: Tasty, made to order pizzas. Very flavorful seasonings.

name: edward kosary
text: Love this place. Great pizza reasonably price (especially for an airport location). Love that it's made to order and doesnt take long (especially if you have little time between flights.

name: Bia L
text: I’ve been to Blaze many times across different locations and I’ve always loved it. Their dough and ingredients are always consistently great, but this particular location was outstanding in terms of service. The staff was extremely …More

name: Natalie Sterne
text: The pizzas were great. So much more affordable for a family of 5 to share 2 pizzas than buy 5 combo meals/ kids meals from a hamburger place. Cool concept of making the pizzas in front of you while you watch. The kids loved it.

name: Project Okie
text: Great gluten free pizza. Quick service. Military discounts.

name: Joyce Slusher
text: Good food great customer service

name: Melissa Ealem
text: Fresh Ingredients and you can get whatever you want on the pizza for no extra cost. The only thing extra is changing the type of crust. You see it go into the oven right in front od you.  I have tried a few different types of pizza and none have disappointed me yet.

name: Asha Singhal
text: Good service & very good taste

name: Joe Funair Jr.
text: Delicious...thin crust and quality ingredients

name: Todd Mahana
text: Blaze in the Bush IAH Terminal A has continued to disappoint, my third and last try.  Service and speed was absolutely horrible.  The manager was smug and didn't care about the slow and wrong service given.  I attempted feedback and he just nodded and smiled. Don't waste your time and money here!

name: Megan Hapanowicz
text: I didn't want to eat anything in Terminal E, and, when I saw some reviews for Blaze, I decided to take the skyway to Terminal A and try it out. It was definitely worth the trip! You design your own pizza for about 9 dollars with whatever …More

name: Blake Binford
text: I had to wait in line for 15 minutes just to be told they were out of keto crust. Putnup a sign or something. Time is important at an airport.

name: Ashwini Srinivas
text: This review is mainly for the customer service. The order was constantly getting mixed up. It was a simple number match. Not sure why that was so hard to follow. it was a frustrating experience to get one pizza. Will not go there again.

name: P. LaMotte
text: When you're in the airport you crave good, fresh food at a fair price. Blaze delivers

name: julio gomez
text: Excellent service. Good food n price

text: Honesly, I dont ever expect much when it comes to gluten free food when traveling but holy cow was I surprised by blaze pizza. They have fresh, let me repeat that, fresh gluten free dough that they press right in front of you.  The press …More

text: Great custom pizza and short wait time.

name: Nathan Henderson
text: They make your pizza exactly how you like it they have all the veggies& meats, sauces, cheese you need really Great place !

name: Cheryl Williams
text: The guys at this pizza place were very sweet and made my order with care.  Shout-out to the tall gentleman with glasses. Thank you for taking care of me. The restaurant was also affordable for the average traveler on a budget.

name: Bonnie Hopkins
text: After waiting in line 15 minutes.  7 people and only 1 actually working. Asked for the Keto Crust which is advertised right in front big screen and advised they dont carry it. I ssked why it is advertised and she said they can't change the …More

name: Veron Reed
text: Fresh, low calories YET delicious pizza! The secret is the thin crust, build your own pizza and share because the portion size is shareable.  The Best pizza! I really give it 10 stars!

name: Cody J

name: Jon S.

name: Lonnie Lehmkuhler
text: First time trying it. Service was great, food was quick, and exceptionally good for a "fast food" style pizza place. Very good prices for an airport too, I'm going to seek out a blaze Pizza joint whenever I fly if I want a pizza.

text: Thin crust, our favorite toppings, cordial Southern service, passionfruit and coconut drinks, affordable all around..this place just has the makings for a great restaurant that we'd go to again. Thanks for making our airport delay actually pleasant.

name: CD Robinson
text: Yummiest pizza I've had since I left NYC and moved to Houston, almost 9 years ago. Vegan options around. Crust is thin and crispy. Sauce is tangy and flavorful. This place really elevates airport food. I had no problem with the service. I wish there were more city locations.
